title: 60,000 feet above Earth, NASA is hunting for the minerals that power phones, EVs and clean energy
description: The microwave-sized sensor detects 'spectral fingerprints' of important minerals.
content: The microwave-sized sensor detects 'spectral fingerprints' of important minerals.
